extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • forEachSubscriber

        protected final void forEachSubscriber(java.util.function.Consumer<S> action)

      • firstSubscriber

        protected void firstSubscriber()
        Called when the number of subscribers goes from 0 to 1. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event.

        This method is called after the newSubscriber(Object) method.

      • newSubscriber

        protected void newSubscriber(S subscriber)
        Called for each new subscriber. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event, for example to publish some initial events.

      • noSubscribers

        protected void noSubscribers()
        Called when the number of subscribers goes down to 0. Overriding this method is a convenient way for subclasses to handle this event.

      • subscribe

        public final Subscription subscribe(S subscriber)
